name: Square & Circle (JUMP)
description:
Hi All,

This is just a very simple game series Idea I am working on. I am taking to the two basic shapes (square & circle) and using one mechanic to develop a game. All the audio effects were created by myself and the background music is from YouTube Studio. I hope you enjoy!

Git Repository is: https://github.com/capitalKage/Square-Circle-Jump-
